commodity.name: Generic Food
commodity.description: Food is necessary to sustain life. Generic food is engineered to be biocompatible with all sentient species and their common ecosystems. So it is slightly more expensive than species-specific food.

commodity.name: K'Rinn Food
commodity.description: Food, generally vegetable, produced on k'rinn-biocompatible ecosystems. Warning : limited risk of not being edible for other species.

commodity.name: Rith Food
commodity.description: Food, generally animal meat, produced on rith-biocompatible ecosystems. Warning : high risk of not being edible for other species.

commodity.name: Human Food
commodity.description: Food produced on human-biocompatible ecosystems. Warning : limited risk of not being edible for other species.

commodity.name: Sshaad Food
commodity.description: Food, generally animal meat, produced on sshaad-biocompatible ecosystems. Warning : limited risk of not being edible for other species.

commodity.name: Shapeshifter Food
commodity.description: Food produced on shapeshifter-biocompatible ecosystems. Warning : medium risk of not being edible for other species.

commodity.name: Pupeteer Food
commodity.description: Food for pupeteer symbiotes, generaly grains, produced from pupeteer-biocompatible ecosystems. Warning : high risk of not being edible for other species.

commodity.name: Ore
commodity.description: Ore is a key material in many industries. Smelted into metals, it provide vital resources to produce all industrial goods. Without ore, the ship-building industry and many others would grind to a halt.

commodity.name: Industrial Goods
commodity.description: An assortment of industrial goods, ranging from cutting lasers to processed metals.

commodity.name: Medicine
commodity.description: An assortment of medicines suitable for curing all sorts of ailments.

commodity.name: Luxury Goods
commodity.description: All sorts of high quality luxury goods, often products of only one planet, or even a particular area of a single planet.

commodity.name: Ziffelan Minidragons
commodity.description: It was already illegal to get minidragons out of Ziffel IV, even before the quarantine, hence their exorbitant price. Plus, the huge requirements of cryosleep make that a one-ton container can only hold a dozen bird-sized dragons.
